LanguageData.AttackTarget.label: attack target
LanguageData.AttackTarget.description: Command the animal to attack a specific target.
LanguageData.Comfort.label: comfort
LanguageData.Comfort.description: The animal will be more emotionally supportive. It will nuzzle more often, and make your colonists happier when it does so.
LanguageData.Dig.label: dig
LanguageData.Dig.description: The animal will mine rock designated for mining. Animals are generally slow and inefficient at mining.
LanguageData.EggSpew.label: egg spew
LanguageData.EggSpew.description: Command the queen to launch an egg sac and a spray of acidic sludge at the target area. Once trained, the queen will only produce eggs when commanded.
LanguageData.Forage.label: forage
LanguageData.Forage.description: The animal will occasionally find berries, mushrooms, or food. Animals will find more food in biomes with higher forageability. Foraging can only be done on fertile terrain.
LanguageData.SludgeSpew.label: sludge spew
LanguageData.SludgeSpew.description: Command the larva to spray an acidic sludge all over the target area. Once trained, larva will only spew sludge when commanded.
LanguageData.TerrorRoar.label: terror roar
LanguageData.TerrorRoar.description: Command the alpha thrumbo to release a deafening roar. This has a chance to send nearby hostile humans and animals fleeing in terror.
LanguageData.ThrumboRoar.label: thrumbo roar
LanguageData.ThrumboRoar.description: Command the thrumbo to release a deafening roar. This has a chance to cause hostile humans and animals to tremble in fear, reducing their movement speed and manipulation.
LanguageData.WarTrumpet.label: war trumpet
LanguageData.WarTrumpet.description: Command the animal to release a powerful roar. This has a chance to cause hostile humans and animals to tremble in fear, reducing their movement speed and manipulation.
